column4: California agency opens third probe into Tesla's Fremont factory
column5: A California agency for occupational safety said on Thursday it opened a third investigation at Tesla Inc's factory in Fremont  California  following a complaint.

column4: UPDATE 1-California agency opens third probe into Tesla's Fremont factory
column5: July 5 A California agency for occupational safety said on Thursday it opened a third investigation at Tesla Inc's factory in Fremont  California  following a complaint.
